CustomField.formula: IF((MOD((CallDurationInSeconds )/60,1)*60) > 10, TEXT(FLOOR( (CallDurationInSeconds )/60)) + ":" + TEXT( FLOOR(MOD((CallDurationInSeconds )/60,1)*60) ), TEXT(FLOOR( (CallDurationInSeconds )/60)) + ":0" + TEXT( FLOOR(MOD((CallDurationInSeconds )/60,1)*60) ) )
CustomField.label: Handling Time
